snippet: “Hudson River Explorers,” a series by the artist Holly Sears, was commissioned by the Metropolitan Transportation Authority to line the overpasses at Tarrytown’s Metro-North station.
abstract: Sylviane Gold reviews paintings by Holly Sears, commissioned by the Metropolitan Transportation Authority to line the overpasses at Tarrytown’s Metro-North station, on view at the Hudson River Museum in Yonkers (Metropolitan/Westchester).
lead_paragraph: “Hudson River Explorers,” a series by the artist Holly Sears, was commissioned by the Metropolitan Transportation Authority to line the overpasses at Tarrytown’s Metro-North station.

headline.seo: A Review of ‘Hudson River Explorers,’ in Yonkers
headline.main: Scenes From Nature, Buoyant and Surreal
headline.print_headline: Scenes From Nature, Buoyant and Surreal
